# High-density Lipoprotein 2010 {#hdl2010}

**Last updated:** `r Sys.Date()`

**Code version:** `r system("git log -1 --format='%H'", intern = TRUE)`

The GWAS summary statistics corresponding to @glipid_nature_2010 are provided by the [Global Lipids Genetics Consortium (GLGC)](http://csg.sph.umich.edu//abecasis/public/lipids2010/). 

The basic information about these datasets is available [here](http://csg.sph.umich.edu//abecasis/public/lipids2010/).

The following analyses have been performed on High-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (HDL-C) 2010 dataset.

- GSEA Round 1 (Section \@ref(hdl2010-1))
- GSEA Round 2 (Section \@ref(hdl2010-2))
- GTEx Analysis (Section \@ref(hdl2010-3))
